text: ahashida, bhumiyehi æti dæyada, (meva atara æti dæyada, visesayen) paksinda, tamange) at tatu vihida (piyambamin) niyata vasayenma allahva suvisuddha karamin sitina bava (nabiye!) oba nudutuvehida? meva siyalla taman suvisuddha karamin næmadiya yutu akarayata niyata vasayenma dænagenama sitinnaha. allahda ovun karamin sitina dæya hondin danneku vasayen sitinneya
